  • Method Details

    • getWellKnownAssetLinksURI

      @NonNull public static URI getWellKnownAssetLinksURI(@NonNull URI baseURI)
      Given an HTTP or HTTPS absolute URI, constructs the corresponding well-known Asset Links URI. For e.g., https://www.solana.com/example will return https://www.solana.com/.well-known/assetlinks.json.
      Parameters:
      baseURI - the base HTTP or HTTPS URI
      Returns:
      the corresponding well-known Asset Links URI
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if baseURI is not an hierarchical HTTP or HTTPS URI

    • verify

      protected boolean verify(@NonNull URI sourceURI, URISourceVerifier.StatementMatcherWithCallback... matchers) throws URISourceVerifier.CouldNotVerifyException
      Load the Asset Links tree from sourceURI, verify its contents, and run the provided StatementMatchers with accompanying AssetLinksJSONParser.StatementMatcherCallbacks against it. This function does not establish any relations between the source URI and any target; sub-classes should employ suitable StatementMatchers to establish those relationships.
      Parameters:
      sourceURI - the URI from which to begin Asset Links parsing
      matchers - the set of URISourceVerifier.StatementMatcherWithCallbacks to match against the Asset Links tree
      Returns:
      true if verification completed without any warnings, or false if non-fatal warnings occurred during parsing. This value does not imply that verification failed; just whether there were syntax or parsing errors that do not impact the validity of the verification result. It is primarily of interest for automated testing.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if sourceURI is not a HTTP or HTTPS hierarchical URI
      URISourceVerifier.CouldNotVerifyException - if verification could not be performed for any reason (such as malformed Asset Links files, network unavailability, too many includes, etc).

    • cancel

      public void cancel()
      Attempt to cancel a running verify(URI, StatementMatcherWithCallback...) for this URISourceVerifier. This will return immediately, however the verification may continue for a short amount of time (until the next cancellation point).

    • loadDocument

      @NonNull protected String loadDocument(@NonNull URL documentURL) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException
